description: Istio Control Plane (istiod) monitoring dashboard for Istio v1.28.2

panels.description: Current Istio version running in the control plane
panels.title: Istio Version

panels.description: Time since istiod process started
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Total number of Envoy proxies connected to istiod
panels.title: Connected Proxies

panels.description: Total number of Kubernetes services known to istiod
panels.title: Services

panels.description: Total virtual services including implicit routes generated by Istio
panels.title: Virtual Services

panels.description: Number of Kubernetes clusters managed by this istiod (multi-cluster setup)
panels.title: Managed Clusters

panels.description: Number of proxies connected to istiod by Envoy version
panels.title: Connected Proxies by Version

panels.description: Rate of push triggers by type (endpoint, service, config changes)
panels.title: Push Triggers Rate

panels.description: P99 latency for XDS push by config type (CDS, EDS, LDS, RDS)
panels.title: XDS Push Time P99

panels.description: P99 time for proxy to receive all required configuration after a config change
panels.title: Proxy Convergence Time

panels.description: Time a proxy waits in the push queue before being dequeued
panels.title: Proxy Queue Time

panels.description: Time between first config change entering debounce and push request being queued
panels.title: Debounce Time

panels.description: Time to send generated configuration to proxies
panels.title: XDS Send Time

panels.description: Rate of XDS pushes by config type
panels.title: XDS Push Rate

panels.description: Average configuration size pushed to clients by type
panels.title: Avg Config Size by Type

panels.description: Maximum XDS request size received
panels.title: Max XDS Request Size

panels.description: Time remaining before root certificate expires. Red < 30 days, Yellow < 90 days
panels.title: Root Cert Time to Expiry

panels.description: Total CSRs received by Citadel server
panels.title: CSR Count

panels.description: Number of successful certificate issuances
panels.title: Cert Issuance Success

panels.description: Rate of certificate signing requests
panels.title: CSR Rate

panels.description: Rate of inbound updates received by pilot (config, eds, svc)
panels.title: Inbound Updates Rate

panels.description: Rate of Kubernetes config events (VirtualService, Gateway, HTTPRoute, etc.)
panels.title: K8s Config Events Rate

panels.description: Rate of K8s registry events (Pods, Services, EndpointSlices, etc.)
panels.title: K8s Registry Events Rate

panels.description: Conflicting inbound listeners. Should be 0.
panels.title: Inbound Listener Conflicts

panels.description: Conflicting TCP over TCP listeners. Should be 0.
panels.title: TCP Listener Conflicts

panels.description: Duplicate Envoy clusters from service entries with same hostname. Should be 0.
panels.title: Duplicate Clusters

panels.description: Virtual services with duplicate domains. Should be 0.
panels.title: Duplicate VService Domains

panels.description: Endpoints without an associated pod
panels.title: Endpoints No Pod

panels.description: Clusters without instances (no endpoints). Should be 0.
panels.title: EDS No Instances

panels.description: Rate of gRPC requests handled by method and status code
panels.title: gRPC Request Rate

panels.description: P99 gRPC response latency by method
panels.title: gRPC Latency P99

panels.description: Go heap memory allocation breakdown
panels.title: Memory Usage

panels.description: Number of active goroutines
panels.title: Goroutines

panels.description: GC pause duration quantiles
panels.title: GC Pause Duration

panels.description: CPU usage rate
panels.title: CPU Usage

panels.description: Open file descriptors vs max allowed
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: Network I/O rate. Receive is positive, Transmit is negative.
panels.title: Network I/O

title: Kubernetes / Networking / Service Mesh / Istio / Istio Control Plane (Istiod) Overview
